jobs.description: The next-generation ride-sharing platform for the Moroccan market. Engineered a dual-transport logic that differentiates from standard platforms by offering Motorcycle transport options alongside cars, optimizing for urban traffic efficiency.
highlights: Designed a real-time price negotiation algorithm
Cross-platform deployment (iOS/Android) with a single codebase

jobs.description: Mission-critical API architecture for a global security leader. Transformed legacy data exchange into a high-performance GraphQL/RESTful hybrid ecosystem, prioritizing encryption and data integrity for sensitive financial transactions. As a Back-end Developer & API Specialist, I optimized architecture for data exchanges and reinforced system security through advanced programming interfaces.
highlights: Reduced API latency by 40% through advanced query optimization
Implemented 'Security by Design' protocols for critical data flows
Conception and development of scalable RESTful and GraphQL APIs
Analysis and refactoring of database queries for performance optimization
Implementation of strict security standards for critical data exchanges (Authentication, Encryption)

jobs.company: Legal Archive Management Workflow Automation @ Confidential Public Administration
jobs.description: Full-stack digitalization of complex legal and administrative procedures for Confidential Public Administration (Ministry of Justice sector). Bridged the gap between rigid legal requirements and modern user experience. Built a secure, high-concurrency platform for sensitive file management. As a Full-Stack Web Developer, I led technical piloting and development of a digitalization solution for sensitive public administration procedures.
highlights: Led the transition from paper-based to 100% digital workflows
Architected a role-based access control (RBAC) system for high-level security
Project management: Team coordination, roadmap definition, translation of complex legal requirements into technical functionalities (Business Analysis)
Architecture & Development: Design of a secure platform for case management, reducing paperwork and optimizing internal workflows
Data Security: Implementation of strict protocols to ensure integrity and confidentiality of sensitive data
Technical Environment: Full Stack development, management of complex relational databases, API setup for service interoperability

jobs.description: Responsive, high-availability web tools for the world's leading phosphate exporter. Created accessible and intuitive digital twins for industrial data, ensuring 100% responsiveness across all hardware (Desktop to Tablet). As a Web Developer & UI specialist, I developed intuitive digital interfaces in a demanding industrial environment, focused on user experience (UX) and accessibility.
highlights: Translated complex industrial KPIs into clean, actionable dashboards
Maintained strict technical compliance within a massive corporate network
Front-end Development: Creation of dynamic and responsive web pages, adapted to multi-device use (Desktop, Mobile, Tablet)
Technical Compliance: Respect for web development standards to ensure compatibility and navigation fluidity within the corporate network
